title: Kanye West slams Kim Kardashian's tight dress as 'too sexy'; Tyler Cameron offers defense
text:
CLOSE Kim Kardashian West said it was her husband's idea to get in touch with designer Thierry Mugler after hearing the Met Gala theme was "camp." (May 7) AP

"Bachelorette" alum Tyler Cameron is jumping to Kim Kardashian's defense.

On Sunday’s episode of "Keeping Up With the Kardashians," the reality star's husband, Kanye West, complained that her skin-tight Thierry Mugler dress and corset for the 2019 Met Gala was "too sexy."

"You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy," West criticized.

Kardashian fired back, "You built me up to be this sexy person (with) confidence and all this stuff, and just because you’re on a journey and transformation doesn’t mean I’m in the same spot with you."

West stormed out of the room, saying, "all right, cool."

More: Kim Kardashian talks tight Met Gala corset, 'innocent intentions' for her own shapewear brand

Kim Kardashian and Kanye West arrive for the 2019 Met Gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 6, 2019 in New York. (Photo: ANGELA WEISS, AFP/Getty Images)

Cameron shared the clip on Twitter Tuesday, calling West's criticism of his wife a prime example of "what not to do." He said the rapper should instead empower his spouse.

"You should want your significant other to be sexy and feel sexy," wrote Cameron, who was previously linked to supermodel Gigi Hadid. "(Kanye) lost his confidence. Fellas if you can’t stand the heat get out the kitchen. Encourage your significant other to be all they can be. Not hold them back."

Encourage your significant other to be all they can be. Not hold them back https://t.co/xETmGXDhjY — Tyler Cameron (@TylerJCameron3) October 15, 2019

During the episode, West told his wife that it affects "my soul and spirit" when she wears revealing clothes that show off her body. He added, "A corset is like a form of underwear, it’s hot. It’s like, it’s hot for who though?"

Kardashian dismissed West's criticism as "ridiculous." She eventually wore the Mr Pearl corset and Thierry Mugler dress to the Met Gala in May, accompanied by West.

More: Kris Jenner was in full momager mode as the Kardashians acted campy at the Met Gala

She described her look to E! as "California girl, stepping out of the ocean onto the red carpet, wet and dripping." She said it was inspired by daughter North West, who calls Kardashian a mermaid.

Unfortunately, the couple made USA TODAY's worst-dressed list for "blatantly ignoring the camp theme." As for West? "Kanye wore one of the more boring red carpet looks of his career."
